fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The town will be notified of Literally A Nuke being rolled on day 1.
- Literally A Nuke will blow up, dealing an Overkill Attack to every living player when the game would end while they're alive.
- Literally A Nuke will appear as good to investigative results.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make it to the end of the game and end the town.
